physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Stridor and urticaria papulosa observed over the entire body. Nasal edema leading to obstruction and slight dyspnea with stridor. Laryngeal fiberscope examination revealed slight vocal cord and tracheal edema. Lateral tracheal X-ray showed mild edema on the anterior surface of the trachea.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Six hours after treatment, edema and urticaria completely disappeared, and hoarseness resolved.

physical_examinations.vital_signs: Peripheral eosinophil count: 7590 /µl, Total serum IgE: 590 IU/ml
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: No remarkable finding on physical examination.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: On March 26: Peripheral eosinophil count dropped to 2800 /µl. On April 8: Count decreased to 400 /µl, total serum IgE level down to 350 IU/ml.
